kpi.name: M8017C7

kpi_info.title: Inter System Handover attempts to UTRAN per neighbor cell relationship
kpi_info.use: Number of Inter System Handover attempts to UTRAN per neighbor cell relationship. UPDATED: Updated when an S1AP:HANDOVER COMMAND message is received from MME for an Inter System Handover. This counter is updated for the source cell of the handover.

kpi.kpi_alias: Inter System Handover attempts to UTRAN per neighbor cell relationship
